alert.note: Alert for Prairie (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued April 03 at 2:45PM MDT until April 06 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a High Wind Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * WINDS...West 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * TIMING...Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Some power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means there is the potential for a hazardous high wind event. Sustained winds of at least 40 mph...or gusts of 58 mph or stronger may occur. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
